humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that 4 out of 8 assessed lymph nodes are positive for metastasis (Axillary 4/8). According to the new rule 14, N2 indicates metastases in 4 to 9 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 4 out of 8 axillary lymph nodes positive for metastasis, which corresponds to N1 stage according to the TNM staging system for cancer. The exact number of positive lymph nodes is required to determine the N stage, and in this report, it is specified as 4/8.
